amendment.description: To authorize the participation of members of the Armed Forces in the Paralympic Games.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1354 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1354 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12778) To authorize the participation of members of the Armed Forces in the Paralympic Games.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1354 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1354 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
